68.title: Amazing Spider-Man
68.author: Stan Lee ; Larry Lieber.
68.series: June 20, 1988) "I Just Wish I'd Bought Him Out of Choice, Not Because I Couldn't Afford the Alarm!"*
notes: Summary: Peter has bought a dog named Lergnom, instead of a burglar alarm, and Mary Jane is happy.

69.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
69.author: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber.
69.series: June 8, 1989) "I Think Lergnom Would Agree With You"*
notes: Summary: Aunt May calls with a last-minute dinner invitation, so the puppy gets the dinner Mary Jane had prepared.

70.title: Amazing Spider-Man
70.author: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber.
70.series: June 19, 1989) "Get Lost Grandpa! No Bums Allowed"*
notes: Summary: Three guys are roughing up an old homeless man, and Peter gets ready to change the odds.

71.title: Amazing Spider-Man
71.author: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber.
notes: Summary: Spider-Man changes the lopsided odds against the Ninja, and one of the gunmen recognizes him.

72.title: Amazing Spider-Man
72.author: Stan Lee, Larry Lieber.
notes: Summary: A soldier with a bayonet charges at Spider-Man saying he can't escape, but Webhead asks if he wants to lay odds.

73.title: Amazing Spider-Man
73.author: Stan Lee, Lerry Lieber.

76.title: Amazing Spider-Man
